pages.title: Teleport
pages.text: Cost: Lv1 = Spell + Ender Pearl / Lv2 = Spell + Chorus Fruit / Lv3 = Spell + Chorus Flower$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br2)XP Cost: Lv1 = 12 / Lv2 = 18 / Lv3 = 24$(br2)The ultimate spell for clearing out those annoying players and mobs, it will send them randomly away from you

When you cast the spell, a small projectile is cast from you. $(br)When the spell hits an entity, it will randomly teleport them away from you in order to leave you alone. $(br)However, the higher level of the spell, the further the range that will be randomly teleported away in
